    • Method Detail

      • createSSLContext

        public static SSLContext createSSLContext(String protocol,
                          KeyManager[] keyManagers,
                          TrustManager[] trustManagers)
                                   throws IOException
        Create and initialise sn SSLContext.
        Parameters:
        protocol - the protocol used to instatiate the context
        keyManagers - the array of key managers, may be null but array entries must not be null
        trustManagers - the array of trust managers, may be null but array entries must not be null
        Returns:
        the initialised context.
        Throws:
        IOException - this is used to wrap any GeneralSecurityException that occurs

      • enableHttpResponseCache

        public static void enableHttpResponseCache(String cacheDir,
                           long cacheSize)
        Enable Http Response cache. Works only on Ice-cream sandwich.
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - Directory to be used as a response cache
        cacheSize - Size of the cache

      • getLocalAddress

        public static InetAddress getLocalAddress()
                                   throws SocketException
        Finds a local, non-loopback, IPv4 address
        Returns:
        The first non-loopback IPv4 address found, or null if no such addresses found
        Throws:
        SocketException - If there was a problem querying the network interfaces

      • extractHttpLinks

        public static ArrayList<String> extractHttpLinks(String text)
        Extract Http links from a given text.

        Looks for the following patterns

        • http[s]://www.google.com
        • http[s]://www.google.com:80
        • www.google.com
        • http[s]://www.google.com/test/test.html
        • www.google.com/test/test.html
        • http[s]://google.com
        It does not work for strings that contains URL's with no "http://" or "www" preceeding the URL. Eg: URL's with just Google.com will not work.

        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:

      • trustAllSecureConnections

        public static void trustAllSecureConnections()
        Makes the platform trust all SSL connections.

        Warning: This should be used for development purposes only

      • verifyURLEncoding

        public static boolean verifyURLEncoding(String url)
        Returns:
        True if the url is correctly URL encoded
